```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(sjPlot)
library(interactions)
library(jtools)
main_effect_updated<-read_csv("/Volumes/GoogleDrive/My Drive/Social media Sensitivity Pooled Analyses/Data Prep/modelling_data_pooled.csv")
```

```{r}
mainEffectPersonality<-main_effect_updated %>%
  dplyr::select(id, StartDateConvert,  
                affect_balance, 
                demog_age.z,
                MediaUse.scaled, MediaUse.mean,
                demog_sex_recoded,
                weekend, 
                nAct.cz,
                surveys_per_id.z,
                lagDur.cz,
                overall_study_day,
                lagged_affective_balance.cz) %>%
  na.omit() %>% dplyr::distinct()

baseline_personality_sm<-lmer(affect_balance ~ 1 +
                                demog_sex_recoded+ 
                                demog_age.z+
                                surveys_per_id.z+
                                overall_study_day+
                                weekend+
                                nAct.cz+
                                lagDur.cz*lagged_affective_balance.cz+
                                MediaUse.scaled+MediaUse.mean+
                                (1+MediaUse.scaled| id),  na.action = na.exclude, data=mainEffectPersonality,
                              REML = TRUE, control = lmerControl(optimizer ="Nelder_Mead"))
summary(baseline_personality_sm)

mainEffectPersonality<-main_effect_updated %>%
  dplyr::select(id, StartDateConvert,  
                affect_balance, 
                demog_age.z,
                socialmedia.cz, socialmedia.bp.z,
                demog_sex_recoded,
                weekend, 
                nAct.cz,
                surveys_per_id.z,
                lagDur.cz,
                overall_study_day,
                lagged_affective_balance.cz) %>%
  na.omit() %>% dplyr::distinct()

baseline_personality_duration<-lmer(affect_balance~ 1 +
                                      demog_sex_recoded+ 
                                      demog_age.z+
                                      surveys_per_id.z+
                                      overall_study_day+
                                      weekend+
                                      nAct.cz+
                                      lagDur.cz*lagged_affective_balance.cz+
                                      socialmedia.cz+socialmedia.bp.z+
                                      (1+socialmedia.cz| id),  na.action = na.exclude, data=mainEffectPersonality,
                                    REML = TRUE, control = lmerControl(optimizer ="Nelder_Mead"))
summary(baseline_personality_duration)
```

```{r}
mainEffectPersonality<-main_effect_updated %>%
  dplyr::select(id, StartDateConvert,  affect_balance, demog_age.z, MediaUse.scaled, MediaUse.mean, demog_sex_recoded, weekend, nAct.cz, surveys_per_id.z, lagDur.cz, lagged_affective_balance.cz, overall_study_day, agreeableness.z) %>%
  na.omit() %>% dplyr::distinct()

agreeableness_sm<-lmer(affect_balance ~ 1 +
                         demog_sex_recoded+ 
                         demog_age.z+
                         surveys_per_id.z+
                         overall_study_day+
                         weekend+
                         nAct.cz+
                         lagDur.cz*lagged_affective_balance.cz+
                         MediaUse.mean*agreeableness.z+MediaUse.scaled*agreeableness.z+
                         (1+MediaUse.scaled| id),  na.action = na.exclude, data=mainEffectPersonality,
                       REML = TRUE, control = lmerControl(optimizer ="Nelder_Mead"))
summary(agreeableness_sm)


int<-sim_slopes(agreeableness_sm, pred=MediaUse.scaled, modx=agreeableness.z, jnplot = TRUE)
plot<-interact_plot(agreeableness_sm, pred=MediaUse.scaled, modx=agreeableness.z) +xlab("Social Media Use Duration (WP)") +ylab("Affect Balance")+theme_apa()+ggtitle("Agreeableness")
plot
ggsave("Interact: Agreeableness Moderator - Use.png")
jn_plot<-int$jnplot + xlab("Agreeableness") +ylab ("Slope of SMU and Affect Balance")+theme_apa()+ggtitle("JN Plot")
jn_plot
ggsave("Agreeableness Moderator - Use - JN Plot.png")

probe<-plot$data %>%
  dplyr::filter(modx_group=="+ 1 SD" | modx_group=="- 1 SD")

probe$trial<-recode_factor(probe$modx_group, `+ 1 SD`="High Agreeableness", `- 1 SD`="Low Agreeableness")
s<-ggplot(data=probe, aes(x=MediaUse.scaled, y=affect_balance, group=trial, colour=trial, linetype=trial))+geom_line(size=1.5)+theme_apa() + scale_color_manual(values=c('Grey','Black')) +xlab("Social Media Use (vs Non-Use) (WP)") + ylab("Affect Balance") + ylim(-3,3) + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(-1,1, 2),labels=c("Before", "After")) + theme_apa()+theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 15))
ggsave("Agreeableness Moderators (BP) of Social Media Use (WP) x Accepted.pdf", width=8, height=8)
```

```{r}
openness.duration.summary<-summary(openness_duration)
openness.use.summary<-summary(openness_sm)

conscientiousness.duration.summary<-summary(conscientiousness_duration)
conscientiousness.use.summary<-summary(conscientiousness_sm)

extraversion.duration.summary<-summary(extraversion_duration)
extraversion.use.summary<-summary(extraversion_sm)

agreeableness.duration.summary<-summary(agreeableness_duration)

neuroticism.duration.summary<-summary(neuroticism_duration)
neuroticism.use.summary<-summary(neuroticism_sm)

write.csv(openness.duration.summary$coefficients, "openness_duration_summary_affectbalance.csv")
write.csv(openness.use.summary$coefficients, "openness_use_summary_affectbalance.csv")
```

```{r}
           "Extraversion Moderator",
           "Openness Moderator",
           "Agreeableness Moderator",
           "Neuroticism Moderator",
           "Conscientiousness Moderator")


tab_model(baseline_personality_sm, 
          extraversion_sm,
          openness_sm,
          agreeableness_sm, 
          neuroticism_sm, 
          conscientiousness_sm,
          pred.labels = predLabels,
          dv.labels = dvLabels,
          file="UseVsNoUse_BigFive_AffectBalance.html")
```
